title: Metacognitive Skill Enhancement in Gaming: Mobile Microlearning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and language learning experience
context.additional_context: Mobile learning environments optimized for post-work hours, targeting office/administrative professionals

learning_goals: Learners can utilize at least three metacognitive strategies to monitor and regulate their thinking processes in game-based learning environments
Learners can self-evaluate language learning outcomes and develop improvement plans through in-game feedback systems
Learners can complete metacognitive journaling with over 80% completion rate through game-based learning activities in mobile environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
